```{r}
link <- "alabama.csv"
l <- read_csv(link)
```

```{r}
colnames(l)[colnames(l) == "DistrictName"] <- "school_district"
l$school_district = as.character(l$school_district)
```

```{r}
l$school_district <- lapply(l$school_district, function(x) paste(x,'SCHOOL DISTRICT'))
head(l$school_district)
```

```{r}
dat <- dplyr::tibble(school_district = as.character(l$school_district))
left_join(dat,district_rankings_2017, by = "school_district") 
```
